name: dfs.namenode.heartbeat.recheck-interval
description:
This time decides the interval to check for expired datanodes.
    With this value and dfs.heartbeat.interval, the interval of
    deciding the datanode is stale or not is also calculated.
    The unit of this configuration is millisecond.

name: mapreduce.task.stuck.timeout-ms
description:
The max timeout before receiving remote task's first heartbeat.
    This parameter is in order to avoid waiting for the container
    to start indefinitely, which made task stuck in the NEW state.
    A value of 0 disables the timeout.

name: dfs.namenode.max.objects
description:
The maximum number of files, directories and blocks
  dfs supports. A value of zero indicates no limit to the number
  of objects that dfs supports.

name: ipc.client.connect.retry.interval
description:
Indicates the number of milliseconds a client will wait for
    before retrying to establish a server connection.

name: ipc.client.kill.max
description: Defines the maximum number of clients to disconnect in one go.

name: fs.s3a.list.version
description:
Select which version of the S3 SDK's List Objects API to use.  Currently
    support 2 (default) and 1 (older API).

name: dfs.client.socket-timeout
description: Default timeout value in milliseconds for all sockets.
